languages.text: "Я знаю, мои собратья сами повинны в своих бедах!" {n}Камень Душ Ирлиэт вспыхивает ярким светом.{/n} "Но сейчас на краю пропасти то, за что я боролась всю свою жизнь. Понимаешь, элантах? Мне нужно поговорить с предками из Контура бесконечности. Таков мой Путь Изгоя".

traits.locale_text: "Я знаю, мои собратья сами повинны в своих бедах!" {n}Камень Душ Ирлиэт вспыхивает ярким светом.{/n} "Но сейчас на краю пропасти висит то, за что я боролась всю свою жизнь. Понимаешь, элантах? Мне нужно поговорить с предками из Контура бесконечности. Таков мой Путь Изгоя".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I know my kin are to blame for their own troubles!" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly.{/n} "But what I have been fighting for my entire life is teetering on the brink of the abyss right now. Do you see, elantach? I must speak to the ancestors from the Infinity Circuit. That is my Path as an Outcast."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю, мои собратья сами повинны в своих бедах!" {n}Камень Душ Ирлиэт вспыхивает ярким светом.{/n} "Но сейчас на краю пропасти то, за что я боролась всю свою жизнь. Понимаешь, элантах? Мне нужно поговорить с предками из Контура бесконечности. Таков мой Путь Изгоя".

Do you see, elantach? I must talk to the ancestors from the Infinity Circuit. Such is my Path of the Exile."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

Do you see, elantach? I must speak to the ancestors from the Infinity Circuit. That is my Path as an Outcast."

languages.text: «¡Ya sé que mi especie es la culpable de sus propias tribulaciones!». {n}La joya espiritual de Yrliet brilla intensamente.{/n} «Pero aquello por lo que he luchado toda mi vida se tambalea ahora al borde del abismo. ¿Comprendes, elantach? Tengo que hablar con los ancestros del Circuito Infinito. Esa es mi senda como proscrita».
languages.original_text: "I know my kin are to blame for their own troubles!" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly.{/n} "But what I have been fighting for my entire life is teetering on the brink of the abyss right now. Do you see, elantach? I must speak to the ancestors from the Infinity Circuit. That is my Path as an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ya sé que mi especie es la culpable de sus propias tribulaciones!». {n}La joya espiritual de Yrliet brilla intensamente.{/n} «Pero aquello por lo que he luchado toda mi vida se tambalea ahora al borde del abismo. ¿Comprendes, elantach? Tengo que hablar con los ancestros del Circuito Infinito. Esa es mi senda como proscrita».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我明白，我的族人犯下了过错，他们这是自作自受！”{n}伊莉耶特的灵魂石发出了耀眼的光芒。{/n}“然而，我一生都在为之奋斗的东西，此刻正在深渊边缘摇摇欲坠。你看到了吗，外界人？我必须和永恒回路之中的先祖谈谈，这就是我的流浪者道途。”
languages.original_text: "I know my kin are to blame for their own troubles!" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly.{/n} "But what I have been fighting for my entire life is teetering on the brink of the abyss right now. Do you see, elantach? I must speak to the ancestors from the Infinity Circuit. That is my Path as an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: “我明白，我的族人犯下了过错，他们这是自作自受！”{n}伊莉耶特的灵魂石闪闪发光。{/n}“然而，我一生都在为之奋斗的东西，此刻正在深渊边缘摇摇欲坠。你看到了吗，外界人？我必须和永恒回路之中的先祖谈谈，这就是我的流浪者道途。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}La pierre-esprit d'Yrliet se met à briller vivement.{/n} « Je sais bien qu'ils sont les seuls responsables de leurs problèmes ! Mais ce pour quoi j'ai combattu ma vie entière est au bord du précipice. Comprenez-vous, elantach ? Je dois parler aux ancêtres du Circuit d'Infinité. Telle est la Voie de l'Errance que je suis. »
languages.original_text: "I know my kin are to blame for their own troubles!" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly.{/n} "But what I have been fighting for my entire life is teetering on the brink of the abyss right now. Do you see, elantach? I must speak to the ancestors from the Infinity Circuit. That is my Path as an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: {n}La pierre-esprit d'Yrliet se met à briller vivement.{/n} « Je sais bien qu'ils sont les seuls responsables de leurs problèmes ! Mais ce pour quoi j'ai combattu ma vie entière est au bord du précipice. Comprenez-vous, elantach ? Je dois parler aux ancêtres du Circuit d'Infinité. C'est là que m'a conduite la Voie de l'Errance que je suis. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「私の血族はは、己の問題だということをわかっている！」{n}ユリエットの魂縛石が輝きを放つ。{/n}「しかし、私が生涯をかけて戦ってきたことは、今まさに奈落の底にある。分かるか、エランタ？私は無限回路の父祖と話さなければならない。それが私の追放者の道なのだ」
languages.original_text: "I know my kin are to blame for their own troubles!" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly.{/n} "But what I have been fighting for my entire life is teetering on the brink of the abyss right now. Do you see, elantach? I must speak to the ancestors from the Infinity Circuit. That is my Path as an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: 「私の血族はは、己の問題だということをわかっている！」{n}ユリエットの魂縛石が輝きを放つ。{/n}「しかし、私が生涯をかけて戦ってきたことは、今まさに奈落の底にある。分かるか、エランタ？私は無限回路の父祖と話さなければならない。それが私の追放者の道なのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich weiß, dass mein Volk die Schuld an seinen Problemen selbst trägt!" {n}Yrliets Seelenstein strahlt hell.{/n} "Doch das, wofür ich mein ganzes Leben lang gekämpft habe, steht gerade am Rand des Abgrunds. Seht Ihr es, Elantach? Ich muss mit den Ahnen der Unendlichkeitsmatrix sprechen. Das ist mein Pfad des Ausgestoßenen."
languages.original_text: "I know my kin are to blame for their own troubles!" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly.{/n} "But what I have been fighting for my entire life is teetering on the brink of the abyss right now. Do you see, elantach? I must speak to the ancestors from the Infinity Circuit. That is my Path as an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, dass mein Volk die Schuld an seinen Problemen selbst trägt!" {n}Yrliets Seelenstein strahlt hell.{/n} "Doch das, wofür ich mein ganzes Leben lang gekämpft habe, steht gerade am Rand des Abgrunds. Seht Ihr es, Elantach? Ich muss mit den Ahnen der Unendlichkeitsmatrix sprechen. Das ist mein Pfad des Ausgestoßenen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Soydaşlarımın dertlerinden kendilerinin sorumlu olduğunu biliyorum! {n}Yrliet'in ruh taşı, parıl parıl parlıyor.{/n} "Ancak tüm hayatım boyunca savaştığım her şey, şimdi uçurumun kenarında yalpalanıp duruyor. Sen de görüyor musun elantach? Ebedî Devre'deki atalarımla konuşmalıyım. Bir Yurtsuz olarak yürüyeceğim Yol bu."
languages.original_text: "I know my kin are to blame for their own troubles!" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly.{/n} "But what I have been fighting for my entire life is teetering on the brink of the abyss right now. Do you see, elantach? I must speak to the ancestors from the Infinity Circuit. That is my Path as an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: "Soydaşlarımın dertlerinden kendilerinin sorumlu olduğunu biliyorum! {n}Yrliet'in ruh taşı, parıl parıl parlıyor.{/n} "Ancak tüm hayatım boyunca savaştığım her şey, şimdi uçurumun kenarında yalpalanıp duruyor. Sen de görüyor musun elantach? Ebedî Devre'deki atalarımla konuşmalıyım. Bir Yurtsuz olarak yürüyeceğim Yol bu."
